AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bookworm
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} has always been interested in acquire knowledge. Ever since {PAWN_pronoun} was young, {PAWN_pronoun} read every book {PAWN_pronoun} got {PAWN_possessive} hands on.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fighter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Since {PAWN_nameDef} was young, {PAWN_pronoun} always liked to stand up for others and never backed down from a fight.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Leader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was always a leader. No matter if in school or with her friends, she always made the decisions and people followed {PAWN_possessive}.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Artist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Spending most time drawing, {PAWN_nameDef} developed a talent for art and crafting over the years.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Space kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was born and grew up on a ship, traveling between planets and never stayed long in one place. Since there werent any children her age on the ships, {PAWN_pronoun} acted like an adult from an early age on.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Commando solider
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Having spend years training, {PAWN_nameDef} joined the Asari fleet forces and became an commando.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fleet scientist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Interstellar warfare is won by technology, so {PAWN_nameDef} dedicated years of {PAWN_possessive} life to advance the technology of the Asari fleet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fleet tactician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} joined the combat divison of the Asari fleet. {PAWN_pronoun} turned out to have a sharp mind for battle, and became adept at commanding large armies to great effect.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bodyguard
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} found work on the Asari fleet, protecting whoever paid {PAWN_objective} from harm. {PAWN_pronoun} gained proficiency in many different combat forms, and was known for {PAWN_possessive} ruthlessness against those who crossed {PAWN_objective}.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Field medic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} used to be a doctor at an hospital.
